title: MASTERY TOKEN BUG!!!!!!! PLEASE HELP ME RITO
body: SO. I got an S- on Riven in a Twisted Treeline match ( i have riven lvl 5 ) and i didnt get a mastery token. I put the link to the match. please help me i need lvl 6 riven urgently.

replies.body: Nice job getting that S!  Currently, tokens are only available through summoner's rift matches per the [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide.  Let me know if that clears things up, and good luck!
